The photograph is a de: colorized version of a promotional image for the 2011 film Auschwitz, directed by Uwe Boll.
The scene depicted in the image: showing a member of the Nazi SS pointing a gun at the back of a baby's head, is not a real-life photograph but a visual reference to the killing of children by Nazis during the Holocaust.
The United States Holocaust Memorial Mus: 5 million children died during the Holocaust, either through deliberate killings or in unsurvivable living conditions.
